<p>

This is the **assigned data download** page. If you need to get your data for an assignment, you're in the right place.

* Put your student ID into the "ID number" box to the left.
* Choose the assignment for which you need the data from the "Assignment" dropdown box.
* Choose your desired data format, if applicable.
* Click the link that appears at the top of the page (under "Data") to download the data for that assignment to your computer.
* Complete the assignment.

It is **very important** that you use *only* the data downloaded from *this* page, with *your* ID, to complete the assignment. If you turn in your assignment completed with different data, you will receive a mark of 0.

[If you want practice data and solutions for an assignment, click here.](`r solve_url`)
